title: Relaxed Seaside Stay Minutes from Yantai's Hongchun Beach
description: Boasting sweeping ocean vistas and only minutes from the shore, Crowne Plaza Yantai Sea View, an IHG Hotel, is your ticket to seaside relaxation. Embark on a day of fun in the sun at nearby Hongchun Beach or pursue some retail therapy at the AEON complex. Unwind with a soothing treatment at the Tea Tree Spa before savouring sky-high sumptuous global cuisines at the revolving Taste of Asia restaurant or a sophisticated cocktail at C-bar.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Yantai Sea View, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 299 Gangcheng East Street, Laishan District, Yantai 264003, China
